structure.unit: PHYSICIANS, OSTEOPATHS, PODIATRISTS, AND RELATED MEDICAL PRACTITIONERS

law.catch_line: Revocation, suspension, denial, declination to renew, limitation, restriction of certification -- Fines, reprimands, probation.

text.section: The board may impose a fine of up to five hundred dollars ($500) per violation as part of a disciplinary action and may require the surgical assistant to reimburse the board for all costs of the proceedings.

law.history: Created 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 126, sec. 14, effective July 13, 2004.
